artist: Artist: Dylan Williams; Printer: Westcan, Manitoba, Canada; Publisher: Spark Plug Comic Books, Portland
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical illustration of silhouetted hand blocking a yellow-blue gradation, with text, printed in color offset lithography on wove paper covers; 36 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography; bound volume
title: Reporter, no. 6
